definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: This is one of the important reasons for overturn of ro-ro ships.
sentences.chinese: 這是許多滾裝船發生傾覆的重要原因之一。

sentences.english: The straight-line pendula type bulk loading conveyor is a high-efficiency continuous conveying device.
sentences.chinese: 直線擺動或散貨裝船機是一種高效連續輸送機械。

sentences.english: The second group stencilled the shipping marks.
sentences.chinese: 第二組用模版印製裝船嘜頭。

sentences.english: This then allows for direct shipments and eliminates transshipping of the product.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就可以直接裝船運送產品，而不需轉船。

sentences.english: You can repair the torn sails and restock the ship and supply fresh navigation charts.
sentences.chinese: 你能修復撕裂的船帆，重新裝船和準備新的導航圖。

sentences.english: The damage was caused by rough handling when the goods were loaded on board ship at the dock.
sentences.chinese: 貨物損壞是在碼頭搬運裝船時因野蠻裝卸所造成的。

sentences.english: The L/C must reach us 30 days before shipment.
sentences.chinese: 信用證必須在裝船前30天開到我處。

sentences.english: It would be difficult for us to accept the revision to our shipping schedule.
sentences.chinese: 就我們的裝船程來說，再作修改會是很繁難的。

sentences.english: Could you ship the goods all at once?
sentences.chinese: 你們可以將貨物一次裝船嗎？

sentences.english: The loading period we fixed is from January to February, 1998.
sentences.chinese: 我們定的裝船期限是一九九八年二兩個月內。

sentences.english: Taking a project in Qingdao as an example, this paper introduces the design of process comparison in water riprap shipment.
sentences.chinese: 以青島某工程爲例，介紹水拋石裝船工藝比較設計。

sentences.english: The machine has been knocked down ready for shipment.
The simultaneous interferences of wave and slip of inside vehicles intensify rolling of ro-ro ship, which is one of the important reasons for ship overturn.
sentences.chinese: 波浪和內部滑動車輛共同作用，使滾裝船的橫搖加劇。

sentences.english: In this connection, you are requested to allow the said heavy cargo to be loaded aboard.
sentences.chinese: 請准許我司將以上貨物裝船出運。

sentences.english: The goods we ordered are seasonal goods. Could you ship them all at once?
sentences.chinese: 我們訂購的這批貨都是時令商品，你方能否一次裝船？

sentences.english: we'll not pay until shipping documents for the goods have reached us.
sentences.chinese: 見不到貨物裝船単據，我們不付款。

definition: to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
